title: New River Gorge National River: Our Staff & Offices
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Our Staff & Offices              Our Staff & Offices        John Petro   Â    The staff at New River Gorge National River also manages two other nearby units of the national park system: Bluestone National Scenic River and Gauley River National Recreation Area. Park headquarters is centrally located in Glen Jean, with employees stationed there and throughout the park. Work groups include Management, Administration, Maintenance Resource Management, Visitor Protection, and Interpretation and Visitor Services.
